Search the Houdini path for the specified directory, returning a tuple of
all the matches.  The directory name specified should be relative to the
Houdini directory.

name: hou.EnumValue
summary:
This class is the base class for an enumeration value.  It cannot be
instanced and is not meant to be used directly by the user.

name: hou.Attrib
summary: This class stores information about a Geometry attribute.

name: hou.CompositorViewer
summary: Minimal class representing a compositing view pane.

name: hou.ApexNodeConnection
summary: Represents a connection (wire) between two APEX Nodes.

name: hou.ApexNodeTypeCategory
summary: Represents the node type category for APEX node types.

name: hou.ObjNode
summary: An instance of an object node in the Houdini scene.

name: hou.ApexStickyNote
summary: Represents a sticky note in an APEX network.

name: hou.Parm
summary:
A parameter in a node.  Each parameter has a unique name within its node
and exists inside a parameter tuple.

name: hou.ButtonParmTemplate
summary: Describes a parameter tuple containing a button.

name: hou.PerfMonEvent
summary: Represents an event that is recorded by the performance monitor and used to generate time and memory growth statistics for profiles.
Return the number of frames per second.

name: hou.RadialItem
summary: Enumeration of locations for radial menu items in Houdini.

name: hou.RopNode
summary: Represents a render output node.

name: hou.ScriptEvalContext
summary: Use this to temporarily change the scripting evaluation context within a Python code block.

name: hou.Gallery
summary:
A collection of gallery entries that can be applied to operator nodes 
to set their parameters to predefined values.

name: hou.Shelf
summary: Represents a tab of shelf tools.

name: hou.LopInstanceIdRule
summary:
Stores a string that expresses a pattern to select instances from a point
instancer primitive by id.

name: hou.AssetGalleryDataSource
summary: Provides an interface to any data source that can be used in association with an asset or snapshot gallery UI.

name: hou.BoundingBox

name: hou.VexContext
summary: Represents a VEX/VOP context. Different contexts allow the use of different functions/VOPs.

summary: The base class for advanced drawables.
